metadata.Title: CVE-2019-13031 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: LemonLDAP::NG before 1.9.20 has an XML External Entity (XXE) issue when submitting a notification to the notification server. By default, the notification server is not enabled and has a "deny all" rule.

criterions.comment: lemonldap-ng: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
